title: PolitiFact - No, these mass shootings werent a plot to protect Hillary ...
summary: PolitiFact investigated a claim shared by conservative rocker Ted Nugent on Facebook, which suggested that three mass shootings were orchestrated to distract from Hillary Clinton-related controversies. The fact-checking organization found no evidence for this claim, noting that timelines of the shootings and Clinton-related stories do not align. PolitiFact rated this claim as 'Pants on Fire' indicating it as false.
snippet: Conservative rocker Ted Nugent shared a Facebook post implying that three shootings were timed to distract from controversies involving Hillary Clinton. But a simple Google search shows that the timelines between the shootings and the stories involving Clinton don't closely match. PolitiFact has two Pants on Fire ratings for this claim.

title: Hillary's 22 Biggest Scandals Ever - Point of View
summary: The article discusses the numerous scandals associated with Hillary Clinton, both from her time as First Lady during President Bill Clinton's administration and her subsequent political career. These include controversies like Whitewater, Travelgate, and Vince Foster's death. The article also highlights more recent issues such as Emailgate, the Benghazi incident, and the ongoing Clinton Foundation scandals. There is a mention of Clinton fatigue among voters, with polls indicating that a significant percentage of voters find Hillary neither honest nor trustworthy. The piece notes that even some within the Democratic Party, like former California Democratic Party Chairman Bill Press, have expressed concerns about Hillary being a risky 2016 presidential nominee due to the scandals surrounding her. Republican presidential candidate Marco Rubio is quoted, emphasizing that Hillary's ongoing scandals are a distraction from core political issues, and might lead to voter rejection. This is set against a backdrop of urging political engagement, such as actions against non-citizen voting and preventing a federal digital currency.
snippet: In the years since the memorable Clinton presidency, Hillary has brought America Emailgate and the Benghazi scandal, among others. ... Hillarys drama could become a distraction, Rubio warned, at a time when the stakes are high for America in the 2016 election. ... Kerby Anderson After a mass shooting, one question rarely asked is ...

title: PolitiFact on Twitter: 'Rocker Ted Nugent shared a social media post ...
summary: Rocker Ted Nugent shared a social media post implying that three mass shootings may have been timed to distract from bad news involving Hillary Clinton. Google searches show the dates of the shootings don’t match up with the stories about Clinton. 17 Jun 2022 There’s no evidence to suggest any of the shootings were staged. And the timing of the shootings do not match up with the events from which they were supposedly meant to distract. Nugent already has two Pants on Fire ratings from us. This ridiculous claim makes it three: Pants on Fire!
snippet: Rocker Ted Nugent shared a social media post implying that three mass shootings may have been timed to distract from bad news involving Hillary Clinton. Google searches show the dates of the shootings dont match up with the stories about Clinton. 17 Jun 2022

title: The Latest Fact Checks curated by Media Bias Fact Check 06/22/2022
summary: The Media Bias Fact Check site dated 06/22/2022 details the verification of claims by various fact-checking organizations. These include corrections to false claims such as JFK Jr. seeking a Senate run against Hillary Clinton, mass shootings being distractions from Clinton controversies, a fake tweet about the Mayo Clinic misdiagnosing Trump supporters, and allegations against Lauren Boebert about abortions and escort activities. The site also checks a claim about vaping's effectiveness in smoking cessation, rated as unproven. Political fact-checks include evaluating the bipartisan composition of the January 6 committee. The site emphasizes using only credible fact-checkers and provides transparency on bias ratings.
snippet: Claim by Ted Nugent: Three mass shootings were meant to distract from Hillary Clinton controversies. Politifact rating: Pants on Fire (Google searches show that the dates of the shootings dont match up with the stories about Clinton.) No, these mass shootings werent a plot to protect Hillary Clinton from negative news coverage.

title: Ted Nugent Posts Video That Shows Hillary Clinton Being Shot
summary: Controversial musician Ted Nugent shared a video that uses computer graphics to depict Bernie Sanders shooting Hillary Clinton during a Democratic debate. Nugent, known for his right-wing views and NRA board membership, posted the video on social media with a provocative comment on gun control. Nugent has had past controversies, including a Secret Service investigation over remarks about President Barack Obama, but no action was taken. Nugent is scheduled to speak at an NRA meeting about the 2016 elections.
snippet: May 10, 2016, 11:42 PM EDT. Controversial right-wing rocker Ted Nugent has shared a video that makes it seem as if Hillary Clinton was shot by Bernie Sanders during a Democratic presidential debate. Steve Marcus / Reuters. Right-wing rocker Ted Nugent took to social media to share a violent video that uses computer graphics to make it look like Hillary Clinton was shot by Sen. Bernie Sanders (I-Vt.) during a debate on gun control.
